func:
const events = []

flow.set('fetched', events)

msg.payload = {
    'command': 'setData',
    'arguments': [ events, false ]
}
            
return [ { topic: 'status', payload: "" }, msg ]

name: doors
doors
validity
card
func:
const format = (n, l) => String(n).padStart(l, '0')

const yyyymmdd = (d) => {
    const year = format(d.getFullYear(), 4)
    const month = format(d.getMonth()+1, 2)
    const day = format(d.getDate(), 2)
    
    return year + '-' + month + '-' + day
}

switch (msg.topic) {
    case 'set-card-valid-from':
        flow.set('put-card.405419896.valid.from', yyyymmdd(new Date(msg.payload)))
        break

    case 'set-card-valid-to':
        flow.set('put-card.405419896.valid.to', yyyymmdd(new Date(msg.payload)))
        break

    case 'set-card-doors-1':
        flow.set('put-card.405419896.doors.1', msg.payload)
        break    

    case 'set-card-doors-2':
        flow.set('put-card.405419896.doors.2', msg.payload)
        break    

    case 'set-card-doors-3':
        flow.set('put-card.405419896.doors.3', msg.payload)
        break    

    case 'set-card-doors-4':
        flow.set('put-card.405419896.doors.4', msg.payload)
        break    
}

return null

name: card
func:
const format = (n, l) => String(n).padStart(l, '0')

const yyyymmdd = (d) => {
    const year = format(d.getFullYear(), 4)
    const month = format(d.getMonth()+1, 2)
    const day = format(d.getDate(), 2)
    
    return year + '-' + month + '-' + day
}

switch (msg.topic) {
    case 'set-card-valid-from':
        flow.set('put-card.303986753.valid.from', yyyymmdd(new Date(msg.payload)))
        break

    case 'set-card-valid-to':
        flow.set('put-card.303986753.valid.to', yyyymmdd(new Date(msg.payload)))
        break

    case 'set-card-doors-1':
        flow.set('put-card.303986753.doors.1', msg.payload)
        break    

    case 'set-card-doors-2':
        flow.set('put-card.303986753.doors.2', msg.payload)
        break    

    case 'set-card-doors-3':
        flow.set('put-card.303986753.doors.3', msg.payload)
        break    

    case 'set-card-doors-4':
        flow.set('put-card.303986753.doors.4', msg.payload)
        break    
}

return null
